Params[3]: I suppose the ripples this art piece is trying to create are not what it appears on the surface...
It has been more than ten minutes since you and Selena unwrapped the box, and you have been trying to understand what you are looking at to no avail.
Objectively, it is a piece of craftwork made with twisting copper wires, but the chaotic shape has made it very difficult to decipher what the artist wants it to represent.
My apologies, Commandant. It appears that my understanding of art is still lacking.

Params[2]: Uh... Perhaps it represents how chaotic the universe is?

Params[3]: All that is transitory is but a metaphor.

Params[2]: This awkward extruded part is actually supporting the structure above.

Params[3]: Sweet are the uses of adversity.

Params[2]: Does this standing pole form a rest sign with the jumbled wires above?!

Params[3]: The night is long that never finds the day.
Indeed, what we see to be true might not be the truth.
Thank you, Commandant. I'll remember to look at the world from more perspectives.
